Amali is a senior undergraduate student majoring in software engineering and minoring in mathematics. She attends Kennesaw State University in Georgia. Amali is currectly working in the Smithsonian OCIO Data Science Lab under Rebecca Dikow. She works in the Bionomia database to credit women scientists for the specimens they have collected or identified. She also uses RStudio to make visual representations of those women's careers.
